meanings.definition: In a general or non-specific manner
meanings.sent1: She spoke generically about the topic without going into specifics.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were written generically to apply to all users.
meanings.sent3: He joked generically about how all cats seem to have the same attitude.
meanings.sent4: The idea of love was presented generically, like a one-size-fits-all solution.
meanings.sent5: The concept was explained generically, making it easy for everyone to understand.

meanings.definition: Relating to a class or group as a whole
meanings.sent1: The generically labeled products were suitable for various uses.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the generically designed furniture for its versatility.
meanings.sent3: The generically dressed man stood out in a crowd of colorful outfits.
meanings.sent4: His speech was generically inspiring, touching the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The generically packaged items were popular due to their broad appeal.
